game.players

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.players.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIPlayer, LocalPlayer, NetworkPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class describing a player (AI, or network)

    • Method Detail

      • calcRoadLength

        public int calcRoadLength()
        Returns:
        the length of this player's longest road

      • checkRoadsAndAdd

        protected boolean checkRoadsAndAdd(Road r,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> listsAddedTo)
        Checks the new road against all other lists of connected roads. If it is connected to one of the connected lists, then it is added and all the members' of that list are updated to reflect the new chain length
        Parameters:
        r - the new road
        listsAddedTo - the list which records if more than one list was added to (i.e. this new road connects two previously separate ones)
        Returns:
        boolean dictating whether or not this method was successful

      • breakRoad

        public void breakRoad(Edge e,
                      Edge other)
        Finds the road chain these two edges belong to, and breaks it into two
        Parameters:
        e - the first edge
        other - the other edge

      • mergeRoads

        protected void mergeRoads(Road r,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> listsAddedTo)
        Merges two roads together if a road was recently built which connects to previously separate ones
        Parameters:
        r - the new road
        listsAddedTo - the number of lists (of adjacent roads) it was added to

        Throws:
